devdoc.details: This contract is used to transfer token from source chain to destination chainnomenclatures: - sourceChain: the chain where token transfer from. - originalChain: the chain where token initial supplied. (for duet token family, it's bsc) - destinationChain: the chain where token transfer to. - originalToken address: the token address on originalChain.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

transferX(address,uint256,uint64).details: called by users on source chain to send tokens to destination chain

devdoc.title: SourceChainBridge
